alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Basin (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 3:10AM MST until December 28 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 4 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Western Uinta Basin. * WHEN...From noon today to 4 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The snow will result in travel difficulties across the Uinta Basin, particularly tonight through Wednesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
